scripts.install: echo "var links = require('./package.json') ['link-dependencies'] || {}; for (var package in links) { if (require ('fs') .existsSync ('node_modules/' + package)) require ('fs') .unlinkSync ('node_modules/' + package); require ('fs') .symlinkSync (require ('path') .join ('..', links [package]), 'node_modules/' + package, 'dir'); }" | node
